QueryDatabase: SELECT dbName, cmpName FROM [SRGC] WHERE dbName in('PTC','ROSE') ORDER BY dbName ASC
QueryBrand: Select -1 as ItmsGrpCod,'ALL' as ItmsGrpNam union all Select ItmsGrpCod,ItmsGrpNam from OITB
QuerySubCategory: select U_SubCategory as 'Code',U_SubCategory as 'Name' from [@SUBCATEGORY] where Code
